title: How to Beat Case 17 on MySims Agents

steps.headline: Hike down the swaying bridges and examine each pedestal.
steps.description: Turn around to the bridge made of rock that seems like 1000 light years away.

steps.headline: Go right after you get to the end.
Find the two temples and go to the blue one.
steps.description: Aka- Moon Temple. Talk to the Skullfinder guy and then go to the left to the Sun Temple. Use the F-Space Manipulator to move the boxes like stairs. Climb up the boxes and use the F-Space Manipulator to open the small trap door.

steps.headline: Pick the lock and open it up.
steps.description: Go down the rope and rotate the mirrors at the bottom of the temple. Take the one that leans like an L and put it on the box closest to the camera. Shine it different ways into different mirrors until all of the boxes at the top open. You may need to switch out the mirrors.

steps.headline: Take all of the items out of the boxes and head upwards.
Give the torch you picked up to Evelyn, and tell her to stand on the pedestal and push the switch once she's on.
Go to the left of the giant temple and move the blocks to where you can step on them and get to the cliff.
Use your rope climbing and balancing technique and climb the Gaia Tree.
Find the lemur named Magellan (the only red one), and talk to him.
steps.description: Tell him to stand on the pedestal. Push the switch once he's on.

steps.headline: Examine the campsite near the rock bridge.
steps.description: Examine the laptop and follow the footprints.

steps.headline: It leads you to a battery.
steps.description: Grab it and head back to the campsite. Plug in the battery and hack the computer.

steps.headline: Give Skullfinder the Golden Idol you found in the Sun Temple, and go inside the Moon Temple.
Repair the chest at the bottom and open it.
steps.description: Give the horn to Buddy and tell him to stand on the pedestal. Push the switch once Buddy is on.

steps.headline: Go to the water pump where you found the battery, and salvage 4 parts.
Fix it, and analyze the water.
Give Lyndsay the cup.
steps.description: If you want to go back to the hq, talk to Evelyn, or want to see anything else in the jungle, do that before pushing the switch on the pedestal with Lyndsay. Then, tell Lyndsay to stand on it... Push the switch and watch.

text: Hike down the swaying bridges and examine each pedestal. Turn around to the bridge made of rock that seems like 1000 light years away. Go right after you get to the end.  Find the two temples and go to the blue one. Aka- Moon Temple. Talk to the Skullfinder guy and then go to the left to the Sun Temple. Use the F-Space Manipulator to move the boxes like stairs. Climb up the boxes and use the F-Space Manipulator to open the small trap door. Pick the lock and open it up. Go down the rope and rotate the mirrors at the bottom of the temple. Take the one that leans like an L and put it on the box closest to the camera. Shine it different ways into different mirrors until all of the boxes at the top open. You may need to switch out the mirrors. Take all of the items out of the boxes and head upwards.  Give the torch you picked up to Evelyn, and tell her to stand on the pedestal and push the switch once she's on.  Go to the left of the giant temple and move the blocks to where you can step on them and get to the cliff. I just used 2 of them. Use your rope climbing and balancing technique and climb the Gaia Tree.  Find the lemur named Magellan (the only red one), and talk to him. Tell him to stand on the pedestal. Push the switch once he's on. Examine the campsite near the rock bridge. Examine the laptop and follow the footprints. It leads you to a battery. Grab it and head back to the campsite. Plug in the battery and hack the computer. Give Skullfinder the Golden Idol you found in the Sun Temple, and go inside the Moon Temple.  Repair the chest at the bottom and open it. Give the horn to Buddy and tell him to stand on the pedestal. Push the switch once Buddy is on. Go to the water pump where you found the battery, and salvage 4 parts.  Fix it, and analyze the water. It is 100% pure. Give Lyndsay the cup. If you want to go back to the hq, talk to Evelyn, or want to see anything else in the jungle, do that before pushing the switch on the pedestal with Lyndsay. Then, tell Lyndsay to stand on it... Push the switch and watch.
